const message=document.getElementById('message').value;if(message===""){return;}document.getElementById('message').value="";const{data,error}=await supabase.from('messages').insert({sender:props.username,message:message});console.log("Sending message: "+message);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:sendMessage// Call sendMessage when form is submitted
,style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",flexWrap:"wrap",justifyContent:"center",width:"100%",alignItems:"flex-end",alignSelf:"flex-end",bottom:"10px",position:"fixed",marginTop:"10px",alignContent:"center"},"aria-disabled":!canChat,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"message",type:"text",placeholder:placeholder,autoComplete:"off",style:{padding:"5px",borderRadius:"20px",border:"1px solid lightgrey",width:"80%",fontSize:"1rem",outline:"none"},disabled:!canChat}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit"// Change button type to submit
